flavor_text_en: The queen of the country of Tei (Tei), who has many excellent star readers, is said to have existed a long time ago. According to one theory, because they were cursed by the existence of the Abyss, their names were given turbidity and turned into mud, and people were transformed into mud bodies.
name: トゥ・クアイ

flavor_text: ハリードが再興したゲッシア朝ナジュ王国の女剣士。真神王教団の襲撃により都を追われ、生き残った者たちを統率する。
flavor_text_en: A female swordsman from the Naju Kingdom of the Gessia dynasty that Harry revived. He is driven from the capital due to an attack by the Shinshinou Kyodan, and leads those who survived.
name: マドレーン

flavor_text: ミカエルとモニカの子孫にして、現在のロアーヌ侯。世界の異変にいち早く気付き、バンガードに塔士団を創設する。
flavor_text_en: He is a descendant of Michael and Monica, and is currently the Marquess of Roanne. He was the first to notice the events in the world and founded the Tower Army in Vanguard.
name: ゼノン

flavor_text: 泥国の星読頭。古代の星読みの術を元に独自の天文道の体系を作り上げた傑人。泥国に保護されるより前の出自経歴は明らかではない。多くの弟子がいたが身の回りの世話はシン・ドゥが務めた。
flavor_text_en: Hoshi Yomi no kuni A masterpiece who created his own astronomical system based on the ancient art of star reading. The history of his origin before he was protected by the Mud Country is not clear. There were many disciples, but Shin Du took care of his surroundings.
name: ダーハオ

flavor_text: リズの娘。名はジョセフィン、愛称ジョー。生まれて間もなくボルカノとウンディーネに預けられ、リズとは離れて暮らす。術の力に長け、湖の主として恐れられる玄竜をも手なずける。
flavor_text_en: Liz's daughter. Her name is Josephine and her nickname is Joe. Shortly after she was born, she was entrusted to Volcano and Undine, and she lives apart from Liz. He excels in the power of jutsu, and can also tame Genryu, who is feared as the lord of the lake.
name: ジョー

flavor_text: 体の一方は澄んだ青碧色、浄化の水。だが一方はおぞましい朱色、燃え盛る炎。疎まれ、拒まれた私と…ジョーはどこか似たもの同士なのかもしれない。
flavor_text_en: One side of the body is clear blue-blue, purified water. But the other side is a horrible vermilion, blazing flame. I, who was alienated and rejected... Joe may be something similar to each other.
name: 玄竜

flavor_text: リズの息子。名はバートランド、愛称バート。生まれて間もなく何者かに連れ去られた。その際、ポルカやリズは彼に関わる全ての記憶を操作抹消されたが、後にカルマンの死によって取り戻す。
flavor_text_en: Liz's son. His name is Bertrand, nicknamed Bert. I was taken away by someone shortly after I was born. At that time, Polka and Liz were erased all the memories related to him, but later regained by Kalman's death.
name: バートランド

flavor_text: 雪のように白い体色は氷銀河では擬態効果がある。凍った湖に棲む玄竜を付近の村人は守護竜として畏れ、崇めていた。思慮深く、バートランドを見守る。
flavor_text_en: The snow-white body color has a mimic effect in ice galaxies. Villagers in the vicinity feared and worshiped Genryu living in the frozen lake as a guardian dragon. Be thoughtful and watch over Bertrand.
name: 玄竜【氷雪】

flavor_text: 命あるものと同化することで、自らの変身能力、記憶操作の術を使うアビスの存在。星の配置や動きを読み解き、未来を予知予言するとも。遠い昔、地上に顕れた際にはオリアクスを名乗った。
flavor_text_en: Abyss that use their own transformation abilities and memory manipulation techniques by assimilating things with life. It is said to decipher the arrangement and movement of stars to predict and predict the future. In the distant past, when they appeared on the earth, they called themselves Oriacs.
name: イゴマール

flavor_text: バンガード領の侯国大学に通う学生。何不自由なく暮らす平凡な少年だが、うっかりパイロット試験に受かってしまい、クラヴィスの一員として事件の調査に関わる。
flavor_text_en: A student who attends the Principality University in the Vanguard Territory. A mediocre boy who lives without any inconvenience, inadvertently passes a pilot exam and is involved in investigating the incident as a member of Clavis.
name: リアム

flavor_text: 異世界で出会う謎の少女。何か探し物をしているらしいが、多くを語ろうとしない。
flavor_text_en: A mysterious girl I meet in a different world. It seems that they are looking for something, but they are not going to say much.
name: アーニャ

flavor_text: ダリアスについてまわるモンスター。食いしん坊で、特に甘い物に目がない。魔獣のにおいを嗅ぎ分ける力で扉の調査を手助けするが、すぐに寄り道をするのが玉に瑕。
flavor_text_en: A monster that goes around Darius. I'm a glutton, and I don't have an eye for sweets in particular. He helps you investigate the door with the power to smell out the smell of a demon beast, but it's easy to make a detour.
name: キャンディ

flavor_text: 商家の生まれ。正義感の強さと父親譲りの商才を発揮し、若くして調査機関クラヴィスを発足した。バンガードの頼れる兄貴分。
flavor_text_en: Born in a merchant family. Demonstrating the strength of his sense of justice and the business acumen of his father, he started the research agency Clavis at a young age. The big brother that Vanguard can rely on.
name: ダリアス

flavor_text: ポルカとリズの父。ボルカノ派の朱鳥術士。世界の再生後、ウンディーネとボルカノは和睦を結んだが、３００年を経て再び敵対、二派の争いから逃れ、妻メリッサと駆け落ちする。
flavor_text_en: Polka and Liz's father. A vermilion master of the Volcano school. After the revival of the world, Undine and Volcano made peace, but after 300 years, they once again fled from hostilities and a conflict between the two factions, and eloped with his wife Melissa.
name: バルテルミー

flavor_text: バルテルミーの妻、ポルカとリズの母。玄武術の優れた資質だけでなく、折れない強さや深い優しさも、リズから孫のジョーとバートへと受け継がれた。
flavor_text_en: Barthélemy's wife, mother of Polka and Liz. Not only the excellent qualities of Genmartial Arts, but also the unbreakable strength and deep kindness were passed down from Liz to her grandchildren Joe and Bart.
name: メリッサ

flavor_text: ９００年前、魔王に村を焼かれ、家族を奪われた魔女。魔王を討つために自分の娘に似た少女をさらい、配下としたが、リズとポルカらに討たれて命を落とす。後にレオニードの血により蘇った。
flavor_text_en: A witch whose village was burned by a demon king and her family was robbed 900 years ago. In order to defeat the Demon Lord, she kidnaps a girl similar to her own daughter and makes her a subordinate, but she is killed by Liz and Polka and others and lost her life. It was later revived by Leonid's blood.
name: イーヴリン

flavor_text: 自称アザミの妹分。もちろん姉妹ではない。自由奔放なように見えるが根は真面目。アザミを師匠と呼び慕っており、戦士たちの訓練を手伝っている。
flavor_text_en: The younger sister of a self-proclaimed thistle. Of course they're not sisters. It looks free-spirited, but the roots are serious. He adores thistles as his master and helps train warriors.
name: スミレ

flavor_text: ゲル状の生命体。色や形状、大きさは様々。他の生き物を溶かして栄養にするものがほとんど。物理攻撃に強いものが多いため、術系の攻撃が有効。弱点の属性は種によって異なるようだ。
flavor_text_en: A gel-like life form. They come in a variety of colors, shapes, and sizes. Most things nourish other living things by melting them down. Since there are many things that are strong against physical attacks, surgical attacks are effective. The attributes of weak points seem to differ from species to species.
name: スライム

flavor_text: 神々のなす奇跡、英雄の雄々しき戦い。どの世界にもそれらを記録し語り継ぐ存在がいる。だが、彼らの残した数多くの詩を読めば、そこに普通の人々の日々の想いを感じることが出来るだろう。
flavor_text_en: A miracle made by the gods, a feisty battle of heroes. There are people in every world who record these things and pass them on. However, if you read the many poems they left behind, you will be able to feel the daily feelings of ordinary people there.
name: 詩人

flavor_text: DESTINY 8というバンドのキーボード奏者。その中身は、伊藤賢治という作曲家らしい。
flavor_text_en: He is a keyboardist for the band DESTINY 8. The contents seem to be a composer named Kenji Ito.
name: ITOKEN

flavor_text: 設定された任務達成のため、敵性存在をすべて消去するようにプログラムされている機械。その容赦ない行動様式ゆえに、様々な世界で「死」の名を与えられている。
flavor_text_en: A machine that is programmed to erase all enemy entities in order to accomplish a set mission. Because of its merciless behavior, it has been given the name “death” in various worlds.
name: デスマシーン
